MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of  Malpas affecting properties in Wynter Lane and surrounding area.  In order to complete repairs on an underground cable our engineers on site will need to isolate the power from 10:30am and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:29am on 15th October 2020.
